attributes.action: Allow students to have the books that have been studied in the GCSEs exam.
attributes.background: GCSEs are getting harder every year one of the example of the unnecessary changes is that students must now remember the exact words of 12 poems, 2 books and are not allowed the poetry anthology or the book during the exam to refer to.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an decision for individual exam boards.
